nameEN: 50+ Expo Admission Ticket (Former Retiree and Senior Expo)
nameZhHK: 50+ Expo 入場門票 (前退休人士及長者博覽)
nameZhCN: 优惠券：50+ Expo入场门票（前退休人士及长者博览）
descEN:
50+Expo (former Retiree and Senior Expo) has been well-established for 9 years. As an unique one-stop platform to accommodate the growing demands of middle-aged and elderly population, it covers all range of products and services such as leisure and travel, retirement planning, medication and health products, investment consultation, caring home service, funeral service and life planning service etc.

Opening Hours:
7-8 July, 2017 (Fri - Sat): 10:00 - 19:00
9 July, 2017 (Sun): 10:00 – 18:00

Location Map: 
Hall 5G, Hong Kong Conventional and Exhibition Centre

Redemption:  
Please present the QR code of the e-ticket at the Hall 5G entrance for admission.

For details:
http://www.retireeandseniorfair.com

Enquiries: 
Tel: +852-25280062
Email: info@retireeandseniorfair.com Terms and Conditions:
• Visitors to the Expo must satisfy themselves with the quality, condition, fitness, detail or otherwise of every product or service before purchase. The organiser does not assume any responsibility for the products of service sold by the exhibitors.
• Please present the QR code of the e-ticket at the hall entrance for admission. Each e-ticket is valid for single entry for one person, no re-entry.
• This ticket is non-refundable.
• The Organiser reserves the right to reject admission to any ticket holder who fails to comply with the Regulations of the Organiser.
• In case of any disputes, organiser's decision shall be final and binding.
descZhHK:
第9屆 50+ Expo (前退休人士及長者博覽)乃香港首個及最大型，專門為退休人士和銀髮市場而設的一站式資訊、產品及服務平台。展會為45歲或以上黃金時代一輩提供優質之衣食住行、消閒娛樂、醫療照護、投資理財、生命計劃及個人提升的消費平台。

展會開放時間:
7-8/7/2017 10:00-19:00
9/7/2017 10:00-18:00

換取中心:
香港會議展覽中心5G 展覽館

換取方法:
請在5G展覽館入口出示有效電子門票的QR code

細節:
http://www.retireeandseniorfair.com

查詢：
電話：+852-25280062
電子郵件：info@retireeandseniorfair.com

條款及細則:
• 參觀人士於展覽會場內試用及購買任何商品前，必須自行檢視商品的質量，確保滿意,主辦機構對參展商所提供及售出的商品將不負任何責任。
• 請在展覽館入口出示電子門票的QR code。 每張電子門票僅限一人使用，可供入場一次。
• 此門票不能兌換現金或其他進場門票。
• 主辦機構有權拒絕不遵守大會規則之持票人士進場。
• 主辦機構保留使用此票的最終決定權。
descZhCN:
第9届 50+ Expo (前退休人士及长者博览)乃香港首个及最大型，专门为退休人士和银发市场而设的一站式资讯丶产品及服务平台。展会为45岁或以上黄金时代一辈提供优质之衣食住行丶消闲娱乐丶医疗照护丶投资理财丶生命计划及个人提升的消费平台。

展会开放时间:
7-8/7/2017 10:00-19:00
9/7/2017 10:00-18:00

换取中心:
香港会议展览中心5G 展览馆

换取方法:
请在5G展览馆入口出示有效电子门票的QR code

细节:
http://www.retireeandseniorfair.com

查询：
电话：+852-25280062
电子邮件：info@retireeandseniorfair.com

条款及细则:
• 参观人士於展览会场内试用及购买任何商品前，必须自行检视商品的质量，确保满意,主办机构对参展商所提供及售出的商品将不负任何责任。
• 请在展览馆入口出示电子门票的QR code。 每张电子门票仅限一人使用，可供入场一次。
• 此门票不能兑换现金或其他进场门票。
• 主办机构有权拒绝不遵守大会规则之持票人士进场。
• 主办机构保留使用此票的最终决定权。
termsEN:
For usage of the coupon through TNG, our standard terms and conditions apply. In particular:
(a) Participating Ticketing Merchants will be responsible for providing the related goods/services;
(b) No refund will be offered by TNG for any unused ticket, voucher or coupon upon expiry;
(c) TNG does not warrant or guarantee the quality, merchantability or fitness for purpose, of goods/services sold/offered by Participating Ticketing Merchants; and
(d) These tickets, vouchers and coupons are only valid upon presentation through our TNG app by the owner of the device housing the TNG app.
